dt: {bc}a remedy for all ills or difficulties {bc}{sx|cure-all||}

dt.t: The law will improve the lives of local farmers, but it is no {wi}panacea{/wi}.

et: Latin, from Greek {it}panakeia{/it}, from {it}panakēs{/it} all-healing, from {it}pan-{/it} + {it}akos{/it} remedy
shortdef: a remedy for all ills or difficulties : cure-all
